articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Giorgio Napolitano, president of Italy, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations existing between the DPRK and Italy would grow stronger this year marking the 10th anniversary of the establishment of their diplomatic ties, Kim in the message wished the president and people of Italy successes in their efforts for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: S. Koreans Called on to Deal Sledge Blows at Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
S. Koreans Called on to Deal Sledge Blows at Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The National Reconciliation Council in an appeal to the fellow brothers and sisters in south Korea issued Tuesday expressed belief that they would deal sledgehammer blows at the Lee Myung Bak pro-U.S. conservative group through the "elections to the local self-governing bodies" with the same spirit and stamina as displayed in the April 19 and May 18 uprisings and thus creditably perform their honorable missions and responsibilities. 
					 The appeal cites facts to prove that the puppet group is making every desperate effort to use the case of its warship sinking for achieving the "election" purpose.
					
					The "elections" are an intermediary judgment to be meted out to the
					
					group, the appeal notes, and goes on: 
					
					The past two years and several months of the Lee group's office
					
					were days of disgrace, tribulation, pain and catastrophe. It is self-evident that nothing can be expected from this group. 
					
					We are stern towards the puppet group of traitors but will always join hands with fellow brothers and sisters in the south desirous of justice, democracy and peace and reunification. 
					
					 There is nothing impossible if all compatriots in the north and the south pool their strength and they can surely drive the foes of reunification out of this land and steadfastly carry forward the June 15 era of reunification. 
					
					 All fellow countrymen in the south, rise up in an all-people sacred struggle for judging the Lee group of traitors, the root cause of misfortune and disasters.  
					
					  You people of all strata in south Korea, vote against the Lee Myung Bak group, representing your mounting grudge and resentment. 
					
					 The workers, peasants and youth and students, fully play your roles as standard-bearers in the struggle for making a clean sweep of the puppet conservative group just as you acted pioneers and vanguard in the resistance of the south Korean people. 
					
					 People from various walks of life including intellectuals, media persons, religionists, businessmen and persons of culture, donâ€™t allow yourself to be suppressed by the group of traitors but offer strong resistance to it through confrontation in the elections.  
					
					 All the democratic and progressive forces in south Korea, achieve solidarity and alliance irrespective of grouping, affiliation and ism to turn the "elections" into platforms for bitterly condemning the group and meting out a final judgment to it. 
					
					 The smear campaign of the pro-U.S. puppet group to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK is bound to go totally bankrupt in face of the dynamic advance of all the fellow countrymen united under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The sacred cause of the south Korean people for independence, democracy, peace and reunification is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Thoroughly Carrying Out a Revolution in Light Industry."
					 Present there were Premier Kim Yong Il, officials of party and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media and working people. 
					
					 The work, published on June 2, Juche 79 (1990), systematizes the Juche-oriented ideas and theories on making a revolution in light industry and clarifies all the issues arising in increasing the production of consumer goods by thoroughly carrying out a revolution in light industry as required by the developing realities and the daily growing material and cultural need of the people.
					
					 Kwak Pom Gi, vice-premier of the Cabinet, in his report said that the publication of Kim Jong Il's work helped establish the most scientific and revolutionary view on developing the light industry in the socialist society and provided a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon for fully ensuring the independent and creative life of the people materially and giving fuller play to the advantages and vitality of the socialist system centered on the popular masses in the DPRK. 
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il a dynamic drive has been waged for implementing the Party's policy for making a revolution in light industry and big progress has been made in the development of the nation's light industry over the past two decades, he said, and went on:
					
					 The level of modernization of equipment and production processes and the quality of products have been dramatically raised and lots of light industrial factories surpassed the peak production year, hitting targets of national economy ahead of schedule through a high-pitched drive waged at the light industrial factories across the country during the historic 150-day campaign and 100-day campaign last year. Many industrial establishments have turned into model ones in the 21st century where cultured practices are established in production and life. 
					
					 These signal achievements made in the strenuous drive for carrying out the Party's policy on making a revolution in light industry instill into the minds of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK the firm confidence that Kim Jong Il's determination precisely means practice and the DPRK will shed its rays all over the world as a thriving socialist nation in the near future, the reporter stressed. 
					
					 The reporter referred to the tasks for conducting an all-out offensive by channeling the efforts of the whole party and the whole state into improving the standard of people's living to glorify this year marking the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea as a year of people's happiness and the prosperity of the country and open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 without fail.

articles.title: Children's Day Marked
articles.content:
Children's Day Marked
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A joint friendly meeting of children and women here and foreign children and women took place at the Taesongsan Pleasure Park on Tuesday to mark the 60th International Children's Day. 
					 It was attended by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, and others.
					
					 Present on invitation were women of diplomatic missions of different countries and missions of international organizations here and other foreign women and children and foreign guests and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, made a congratulatory speech at the meeting.
					
					 Then it was followed by an art performance given by children. 
					
					Korean children presented numbers representing the happy life they are leading while bringing their talents into full bloom under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Foreign children sang Korean songs well to be acclaimed by audience.
					
					 The Korean and foreign children had diverse sports and amusement games such as jumping over flower-decorated rope, looking for things and snatching a ball.
					
					 After the amusement games the participants spent pleasant time, dancing together and using amusement facilities. 
					
					 A friendly gathering was also held in Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province, on the same day. 
					
					 It was attended by staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulate generals in Chongjin.

articles.title: Korean Children Enjoy Benefits of State
articles.content:
Korean Children Enjoy Benefits of State
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean children are celebrating the 60th International Children's Day, June 1, at the nurseries, kindergartens and pleasure parks.
					 In the Democratic People's Republic of Korea the children live a happy life under the state and public care.
					
					 The Government of the DPRK spares nothing for the rising generation in the principle of giving the best things to the children first.
					
					 Even in the days of the "Arduous March", forced march when the country was going through harsh ordeals, the state rationed the children with food and provided them with bean milk and fruits.  
					
					 Nutritious foodstuffs, including chicken and eggs produced by chicken farms across the country, have also been supplied to them first.
					
					 The state has offered medical service, including vaccination, to them on a regular basis, while giving priority to the production of teaching tools for their intellectual development. 
					
					 Kim Sun Yong, 36, residing in Central District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that her children owe many things to the state, more than to their parents.

articles.title: Stamps of Kim Jong Il's China Visit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's China Visit Marked with Postage Stamps
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- New stamps (one souvenir sheet and three sheetlets) have been brought out in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to commemorate the unofficial visit to the People's Republic of China paid by General Secretary Kim Jong Il early in May. 
					 Seen in the stamps are national flags of the DPRK and PRC as well as inscriptions "Commemoration of the unofficial visit of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il to the PRC," "May 5 - May 6, Juche 99 (2010)," "Commemoration of the unofficial visit of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il to the northeastern part of China," "May 3 - May 7, Juche 99 (2010)" and "Epoch-making event in the DPRK-China friendship history."
					
					 The souvenir sheet carries pictures of Kim Jong Il meeting with President Hu Jintao and having talks with him. 
					
					 Printed in the sheetlets are pictures of Kim Jong Il meeting with senior officials of the Chinese party and government and visiting the Boao Biological Co., Ltd. on the outskirts of Beijing and the Dalian Xuelong Industry Group, Tianjin Port, Liaoning Fishery Group and other units in the northeastern part of China.

articles.title: Stamps of Children's Day, World Cup
articles.content:
Stamps of Children's Day, World Cup
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- New postage stamps have been issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the 60th International Children's Day and the to-be-soon-held 2010 South Africa World Cup.
					 The souvenir sheet commemorating the children's day portrays Korean children living a happy life under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK Government.
					
					 Seen in the souvenir sheet and sheetlet marking the world cup are its trophy and footballers playing matches.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Campaign Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Campaign Condemned
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have scathingly condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for linking the sinking of warship "Cheonan" with the DPRK in a far-fetched way and driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					 Kim Jong Su, 48, a work-team leader of the Pyongyang Steel Factory, told KCNA that the architect of the incident, an unheard-of farce, is none other than the south Korean regime.
					
					 The whole course of the incident and such things as "investigation results" and Lee's "statement to the people" reveal their true colors as conspirators, he said, and continued:
					
					 They sacrificed even lives of puppet army privates for their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 The achievements made by the entire Korean people over the past decade in the spirit of "by our nation itself"  after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration have all been neutralized, even joint pro-reunification events of the nation blocked up and the danger of war enlarged on the peninsula.
					
					 The regime, which is seeking confrontation with the north and a nuclear war on the peninsula with the backing of outside forces, deserves a vehement condemnation from the entire Korean nation.
					
					 Yu Pok Sun, 42, a peasant of the Migok Co-op Farm in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province, told KCNA that the south Korean regime has persistently pursued the policy of confrontation with the north, wrecking the historic June 15  joint declaration and the program for its implementation, that is October 4 declaration, and leading the north-south relations to the state of war.
					
					 The south Korean regime will know how dearly it has to pay for their crimes, she added.
					
					 Ri Kyong Il, 20, a student of Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies, said in an interview with KCNA that the regime faked up the incident with the approach of "elections to local self-governing bodies" in an attempt to stave off its crisis and that those seeking a war and confrontation, estranged from the nation, are bound to face a miserable end.

articles.title: US Accused of Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
US Accused of Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The U.S. authorities are busy everyday taking the lead in the anti-DPRK smear campaign, groundlessly asserting that the sinking of warship "Cheonan" was a "provocation" of the DPRK, it "should pay dearly for the case" and  "its act will entail adverse consequences" and the like. U.S. Congress is making much fuss, "adopting a resolution condemning north Korea" and "pushing forward a bill on financial sanctions against it." The U.S. went the lengths of vociferously crying out for tightening "sanctions" and increasing pressure upon the DPRK through the UN Security Council. 
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 Such action indicates that the U.S. scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK designed to tighten the international siege to the DPRK and isolate and stifle it with the above-said warship case as a momentum is now assuming unprecedentedly grave and dangerous nature. 
					
					 It is a stereotyped trick of the U.S. to spark off conflict and trouble between fellow countrymen in a bid to fish in troubled waters.
					
					 The U.S., regarding the recent sinking of the south Korean puppet warship as a golden opportunity to ignite the second Korean war, zealously egged the puppet gang on to orchestrate a farce unreasonably branding the DPRK as "a suspect." 
					
					 It is the ulterior aim of the U.S. to internationalize sanctions against the DPRK in a bid to stifle it and use south Korea as a servant for carrying out Washington's Asian strategy. 
					
					 The U.S. Department of State held that the sinking of the warship was the matter irrelevant to the transfer of the "right to command wartime operations", but it is clear that the case is a product of the moves to justify the permanent presence of the U.S. forces in south Korea. 
					
					 The case of the warship sinking also helped the U.S. settle the controversial issue of the U.S. military base in Futenma with ease.
					
					 The madcap anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces has created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula and put the process of denuclearizing the peninsula on the verge of collapse. The whole buck stops with the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts for War Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts for War Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Lee Myung Bak of south Korea was reported to have told a recent "conference of elder statesmen" that his group has so far "put emphasis on threats from outside" while "overlooking threat at home" and that "it has failed to establish the conception of the principal enemy" over the past decade.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is little short of an instruction to completely revive the "conception of the principal enemy". Lee's outbursts clearly indicate his bellicose scenario to fan up the hostility toward the DPRK to the extreme phase under the pretext of the warship sinking, adopt it as a policy to escalate confrontation and tensions and provoke a nuclear war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The "conception of the principal enemy" had been thrown into the dumping ground of history by the fellow countrymen after being rebuffed and censured for being an anachronistic theory of confrontation and war contrary to the June 15 era of reunification. The confrontation agitated by Lee with this "conception" revived can never be overlooked as it is a treacherous act to launch a war against the DPRK at any cost, keeping the inter-Korean relations in the state of uncontrollable catastrophe.  
					
					 The formal stipulation of the "conception of the principal enemy" precisely means the stipulation of a scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will take one merciless action after another to react to the "retaliation" of provocateurs, just as it had declared, now that the puppet group of south Korea has become undisguised in its scheme to launch a war of aggression against the DPRK by abusing the case of warship sinking.
					
					 The puppet group will be fully accountable for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's War Moves Denounced by Chongryon
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's War Moves Denounced by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), released a statement on May 29 lashing out at traitor Lee Myung Bak's moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Absolutely intolerable, the statement said, is the criminal plots of traitor Lee Myung Bak to bring to naught the precious successes made by the concerted efforts of all Koreans since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and to do harm to the fellow countrymen in cahoots with outside forces.
					
					 The frantic racket of confrontation with the DPRK kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak group over the sinking of the warship "Cheonan" is an open declaration of war against the DPRK and a heinous criminal act of pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of a war, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The group is crying out for additional "sanctions" against the DPRK in defiance of the unanimous desire of all Koreans for reunification and peace, but this will only bring it self-destruction.
					
					 Neither peace of the nation nor the country's reunification is expected as long as traitor Lee Myung Bak is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 The officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will resolutely smash the scheme of traitor Lee Myung Bak, the wicked foe of the nation, to ignite a war by pooling efforts with all other fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad.

articles.title: US Anti-DPRK Campaign Blasted in Denmark
articles.content:
US Anti-DPRK Campaign Blasted in Denmark
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on May 25 assailing the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. 
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea made public the "results of investigation" groundlessly linking the sinking of the warship "Cheonan" with the DPRK and has since intensified the anti-DPRK moves as never before, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK had already clarified that it has nothing to do with the above-said case and, through a statement of a spokesman for its NDC, notified the south side that it would send an inspection group to south Korea for fair probe into the case.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, however, launched an intensive anti-DPRK smear campaign, trumpeting about what it called "retaliation." The campaign is joined by the U.S. 
					
					 This has created on the Korean Peninsula such situation where a war may break out any moment. 
					
					 The association strongly demands that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and stop at once the dangerous moves they are conducting, crying out for "retaliation" and "sanctions" against it, said the statement.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in UK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in UK
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), says that the 60-year-long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and of gigantic creations and changes in which the Korean people protected the sovereignty and honor of the country and built a rich and powerful socialist country under the guidance of the great leader and the great party, weathering the tempest of the revolution.
					
					 It clarifies tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding aloft the banner of the Juche idea, the banner of   Songun.

articles.title: CRN llama a castigar a banda de Lee Myung Bak en "elecciones locales"
articles.content:
CRN llama a castigar a banda de Lee Myung Bak en "elecciones locales"
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ATCC) -- El Consejo por la Reconciliacion Nacional (CRN) hizo publica este martes una proclama a los compatriotas surcoreanos expresando la confianza de que ellos cumpliran su mision y responsabilidad al dar un golpe duro a la banda de los conservadores proyanquis de Lee Myung Bak en las inminentes "elecciones de autonomia local" con aquel impetu con que realizaron los levantamientos populares del 19 de abril y del 18 de mayo.
					El documento revela con datos que la banda de los titeres surcoreanos se esfuerza desesperadamente por utilizar el caso de hundimiento del buque "Cheonan" en las referidas "elecciones".
					
					Las "elecciones de autonomia local" de esta vez significaran la sentencia intermedia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Los dos anos y pico de mandato de ella fueron el periodo en que sucedieron verguenzas, sufrimientos, dificultades y colapso.
					
					 Claro esta que ya no hay nada que esperar de esos tipejos.
					
					La RPDC se muestra rotunda a la banda traidora titere, pero, marchara siempre mano a mano con los compatriotas surcoreanos que aspiran a la justicia, la democracia, la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Si todos los connacionales del Norte y el Sur unen sus fuerzas, no habra ninguna imposibilidad y podran dar continuidad a la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio expulsando de este territorio a los enemigos de reunificacion.
					
					Los compatriotas surcoreanos, levantense en la sagrada lucha de todo el pueblo por enjuiciar a la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak, factor de desgracias y desastres.
					
					 Los habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea, voten en contra de esa banda descargando el gran rencor e indignacion del pueblo.
					
					 Los obreros, campesinos, jovenes y estudiantes, cumplan su papel de abanderados de la lucha por eliminar a la banda conservadora titere como aquel tiempo en que se hicieron precursores y vanguardias en la lucha de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					 Los habitantes de diferentes sectores como intelectuales, publicistas, religiosos, economistas y hombres de cultura, protesten resueltamente en esas "elecciones" dejando de ser reprimidas por la camarilla traidora.
					
					 Todas las fuerzas democraticas y progresistas del Sur de Corea, logren la unidad por encima de las diferencias de sus fracciones, afiliaciones y criterios para convertir las presentes "elecciones" en el tribunal para condenar categorica y finalmente a la camarilla traidora.
					
					 La campana intrigante de la camarilla de Lee en busca de la confrontacion con la RPDC sera fracasada totalmente ante el avance impetuoso de todos los coreanos unidos bajo la bandera del 15 de Junio.
					
					Triunfara sin falta la sagrada causa de los habitantes surcoreanos por la independencia, la democracia, la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Acto central por 20o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 20o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central dedicado al 20o aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para cumplir cabalmente la revolucion de la industria ligera", publicada el 2 de junio del 79 (1990) de la Era Juche.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el premier del Consejo de Ministros Kim Yong Il, los funcionarios de organos del partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los funcionarios y trabajadores de sector de industria ligera.
					
					En la obra estan sistematizadas la autoctona idea y teoria sobre la revolucion de la industria ligera y se dan las respuestas perfectas a todos los problemas para aumentar la produccion de articulos de consumo popular cumpliendo cabalmente la revolucion de la rama conforme a la realidad en desarrollo y a la creciente demanda material y cultural de los habitantes.
					
					 El vicepremier Kwak Pom Gi en el informe de ocasion senalo que con la publicacion de la obra, se establecio el criterio mas cientifico y revolucionario sobre el desarrollo de la industria ligera en la sociedad socialista y se preparo la potente arma ideo-teorica para satisfacer materialmente la vida independiente y creativa de los habitantes y poner en pleno juego la superioridad y la vitalidad del regimen socialista de Corea centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Subrayo que bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente    Kim Jong Il, se ha desplegado energicamente durantes los ultimos 20 anos la lucha por materializar la orientacion del partido sobre la revolucion de industria ligera y se ha logrado gran avance en el desarrollo de esta rama.
					
					Durante las historicas campanas de 150 y de 100 dias del ano pasado, se registro la oleada de modernizacion en las fabricas de la industria ligera a lo largo del pais y se elevaron rapidamente el nivel de modernizacion de equipos y procesos de produccion y la calidad de los productos, apunto.
					
					Numerosas fabricas del sector sobrecumplieron con adelanto el plan de economia nacional rompiendo el nivel del ano en que se establecio el record de la produccion, preciso.
					
					Ademas, muchas fabricas y empresas se han acondicionado magnificamente como plantas ejemplares del siglo 21 que satisfacen los requisitos de la cultura de produccion y vida, destaco.
					
					Enfatizo que los orgullosos exitos logrados en la energica lucha por materializar la orientacion del partido sobre la revolucion de la industria ligera dieron al ejercito y al pueblo de Corea la firme conviccion de que la decision del Dirigente        Kim Jong Il se materializa sin falta y Corea brillara en un futuro cercano en el mundo como gran potencia prospera socialista.   
					
					Por ultimo, el informante enumero las tareas para hacer de este ano del aniversario 65 de la fundacion del partido un ano de inmensa felicidad del pueblo y para abrir a toda costa en 2012 las puertas a la gran potencia prospera al lanzar una ofensiva general por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo canalizando las fuerzas de todo el partido y todo el pais en esta lucha.

articles.title: Encuentros de amistad por 60o aniversario del Dia de la Infancia
articles.content:
Encuentros de amistad por 60o aniversario del Dia de la Infancia
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del Dia Internacional de la Infancia, tuvo lugar este martes en la Zona de Recreo Taesongsan el encuentro de amistad entre los ninos y mujeres de esta capital y los de otros paises.
					 Participaron el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema Yang Hyong Sop, el ministro de Educacion Kim Yong Jin y otros funcionarios. 
					
					 Entre los invitados se distinguian las mujeres de las representaciones diplomaticas de varios paises y de las oficinas de organizaciones internacionales en Corea, mujeres, ninos y huespedes extranjeros, asi como compatriotas en ultramar. 
					
					  La presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, Ro Song Sil, pronuncio un discurso de felicitacion.
					
					En la ocasion se ofrecio una funcion artistica de ninos.
					
					Los ninos coreanos presentaron las piezas que muestran la vida feliz de si mismos que viven en el regazo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il cultivando sus talentos. Los infantes extranjeros arrancaron la efusiva ovacion del publico al interpretar bien canciones coreanas.
					
					  Ellos realizaron luego los juegos deportivos y recreativos como el salto a la comba, la busqueda de objetos, la pelea por la pelota, etc. 
					
					 Terminada la competencia, los participantes bailaron y pasaron alegres ratos usando las instalaciones recreativas. 
					
					 Este dia, los miembros de los consulados generales de China y de Rusia, acreditados en Chongjin, participaron en el acto similar efectuado en esta urbe de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun inculpa a EE.UU. de agravar tension de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun inculpa a EE.UU. de agravar tension de Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este martes un comentario individual que sigue:
					En estos dias, las autoridades norteamericanas se ponen al frente en calificar sin ningun fundamento el hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" de "acto provocativo" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando de que esta "debe pagar su precio" y "se causaran las consecuencias".
					
					 Entre tanto, el congreso norteamericano arma un escandalo para la aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion condenatoria al Norte de Corea" y el tratamiento del "proyecto de ley de la sancion financiera contra el Norte".
					
					Para colmo, habla tanto de la necesidad de intensificar la "sancion" y la presion mediante el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					 Esto demuestra que se tornan mas graves y peligrosas que nunca las maniobras belicistas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. que piensa apretar el cerco internacional contra la primera aprovechando el caso del "Cheonan" con el fin de aislarla y atropellarla finalmente.
					
					  Es un metodo predilecto del imperio sacar provechos metiendo cizanas y discordias entre los integrantes de la misma nacion.
					
					 Tomando el citado caso como magnifica oportunidad para desatar la segunda guerra coreana, azuzo a los titeres surcoreanos a orquestar ese drama en que la RPDC es tildada de "sospechosa".
					
					  EE.UU. tiene la ambicion de internacionalizar la sancion contra la RPDC para asfixiarla y usar el Sur de Corea como lacayo en la realizacion de su estrategia sobre Asia.
					
					 Si bien el Departamento de Estado norteamericano habla de que ese incidente no tiene nada que ver con el problema de "traspaso del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra", esta claro que fue un producto de las tentativas de justificar la presencia perenne de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Gracias al estallido del incidente, EE.UU. pudo resolver facilmente el espinoso asunto de su base en Futenma.
					
					  Debido a la demencial campana de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC, se dio en la Peninsula Coreana la situacion extremadamente critica y ha sido condenado al fracaso el proceso de desnuclearizacion.
					
					 EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos son totalmente responsables de ello.
